query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'productMaterials' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2CoKcC9nrGmnRVN.e5cb2b17c667 --database 4s2RPQbUiLyDQzYKK4VQq2 --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'productMaterials' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION;
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE	IS_NULLABLE
id	int	NO
productId	int	NO
materialId	int	NO
quantity	decimal	NO
createdAt	timestamp	NO
updatedAt	timestamp	NO
